name: Mini Croissants
description: Bite size croissants perfect for nibbling or to stare at.

name: Oatmeal Raisin Cookie
description: Thicc, chewy cookie filled with oatmeal, raisins, and walnuts.

name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Babka
description: Loaf of brioche bread filled with savory peanut butter and chocolate.

name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Cookie
description: Warm, gooey chocolate cookie filled with Reeses pieces.

name: Peanut Butter Cruffin
description: Cruffin that is filled with a peanut butter cream and coated in sugar.

name: Purple Sweet Potato Sourdough
description: Sourdough loaf that is laminated with purple sweet potato, cranberries, and walnuts.

name: S'mores Sourdough
description: Sourdough loaf that is laminated with dark chocolate and graham crackers. Finished and toasted with marshmallow fluff and more chocolate.

name: Apple Tart
description: Shareable apple tart that packs a sweet, cinnamon flavor.

name: Blueberry Cruffin
description: Bicolor cruffin that is filled with homemade blueberry jam and coated in sugar.

name: Chocolate Cookie
description: For those that prefer a thinner cookie. Large, chewy cookie filled with dark chocolate.

name: Cinnamon Cruffin
description: Cruffin that is coated in an addictive cinnamon sugar.

name: Country Sourdough
description: Whole wheat and bread flour based sourdough. Perfect for any occasion.
